name: P0-portfolio
body:
### Project 0 - Udacity Android Developer Nanodegree
This is my code for the project 0 - Personal App Portfolio. You are asked to *design and build an app that shows off the apps that you'll create as part of the Nanodegree.*

You can see a sample video of the app running.
[![P0 Video](http://img.youtube.com/vi/EsnioHT7E9Q/0.jpg)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EsnioHT7E9Q)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
